sources.description: A propaganda film during World War II about a boy who grows up to become a Nazi soldier. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/education-for-death-the-making-of-the-nazi-1943/

metadata.Plot: A Walt Disney wartime propaganda look into the mind of Hans, a boy born into a German family. Watch as his attitude about the value of human life degrades as he is exposed to Hitler Youth and other Nazi organizations and attitudes.
metadata.Actors: Eileen Carlisle, Robert A. Davis, Lisa Golm
